description: Get the standard/active variation defined by Shopee, which is currently a three-layer tree structure. The top layer is variations, the second layer contains variations_0 and variations_1, and the leaf layer contains variations_2.

common_parameters.name: partner_id
common_parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful Required for all APIs

common_parameters.name: timestamp
common_parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request Required for all requests. Example is 1586168037

common_parameters.name: access_token
common_parameters.description: The token for API access. Used to identify your permission to use API. Valid for token.valid_seconds of token.

common_parameters.name: shop_id
common_parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for all APIs

common_parameters.name: sign
common_parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, and shop_id params. More details at https://partner.test-stable.shopeemobile.com/docs/v2/

response_parameters.name: error
response_parameters.description: Indicate error type if any error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: message
response_parameters.description: Indicate error details if any error. Empty if no error happened

response_parameters.name: request_id
response_parameters.description: The identifier for API call tracking

notes: The documentation includes sample request and response examples in JSON format, and shows API permissions section at the bottom. The endpoint appears to be part of Shopee's product variation management API.
